titles.title: Expressing profound sorrow upon the death of Luis Jimenez and recognizing his distinguished career and great contributions to American art.
Expressing profound sorrow upon the death of Luis Jimenez and recognizing his distinguished career and great contributions to American art.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Declares that the House of Representatives expresses profound sorrow at the untimely death of Luis Jimenez and recognizes his distinguished career and great contributions to American art.
